product.title: Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Beauty and the Beast:
The Enchanted Christmas

Disney favorites Belle and the Beast make a delightful reappearance in this magical holiday tale. As part of her ongoing efforts to win over the bad- tempered Beast and melt his heart, Belle decides to infuse the castle with the spirit and goodwill of the Christmas season. Kids will recognize her team of lovable helpers as the supporting cast of characters from the original Beauty and the Beast. This heartwarming holiday story will leave young readers with a new appreciation of the magic and meaning of the Christmas season.

Tie-in Activity: During the holidays, help your child lift the spirits of someone who may be lonely at this time of year. Visit a nursing home with Christmas cookies, distribute toys to an orphanage, or offer to help an elderly neighbor decorate their home for the holidays.
